component.name: Null IDE
component.summary: The Ultimate Hacker's Code Editor & Security Toolkit

description.p: Null IDE is a professional development environment that combines the power of Monaco code editor with 60+ integrated security testing and developer tools. Designed for security researchers, penetration testers, and developers who demand complete privacy and powerful functionality.

ul.li: Monaco Code Editor with full language support and syntax highlighting
60+ Security Tools: Port Scanner, SQLi Tester, XSS Detector, LDAP/XPath/NoSQL Injection, JWT Analysis, and more
Real PTY Terminal with node-pty (Bash, Zsh, PowerShell support)
Privacy-Focused: All data stored locally, no telemetry or tracking
API Security Testing: GraphQL Scanner, Rate Limit Tester, CORS Tester
Web Security: Cache Poisoning, DNS Rebinding, DOM XSS Scanner
Payload Generators: Reverse Shell, Web Shell, Code Obfuscator
Crypto Tools: Hash Cracker, JWT Decoder, Encryption Tools
Network Tools: DNS Analyzer, WHOIS Lookup, Subdomain Finder
Developer Utilities: Base64, JSON Formatter, Regex Tester, UUID Generator
